content.html:
The following fixes the test:

diff -r ea736e4772e3 test/integration/speed_pr2.cc
--- a/test/integration/speed_pr2.cc Tue Jan 20 11:55:49 2015 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/speed_pr2.cc Tue Jan 20 17:31:55 2015 -0800
@@ -41,7 +41,12 @@
   emptySpeed = GetPercentRealTime();

   // Load the pr2into the world
+  physics::WorldPtr world = physics::get_world();
+  ASSERT_TRUE(world != NULL);
+  world->SetPaused(true);
   SpawnModel("model://pr2");
+  WaitUntilEntitySpawn("pr2", 100, 1000);
+  world->SetPaused(false);
   common::Time::MSleep(2000);
   double loadedSpeed = GetPercentRealTime();
